Html:
I have been taking a look at the SQL Data structure for the version posted today. I realize that this is still indevelopment. Is there plans to include more information about the players? For example, Birthdate, ParentsMemberid. This would help link a player to a parent, or in some cases, multiple children to a single parent. Birthday is required for teams with age requirements.

Thanks,
Ryan
Actually, you can add that yourself to the Players table. I kept that in mind in my design. I will post some docs on that soon.
